title: Feature request - option to dialup connection and wait for ip availability?
author: wrfak
body_snippet:
<!-- Feature Request -->
This can be done by existing Externals feature, so not an request, but improvement idea. 

FIRST FEATURE
Add possibility to dialup connection (VPN) with following cfg.opts. : 

1. choice of connection (out of listed existing connections)
2. Selection and input lines to define vpn credentials -  system or mRemote stored. 
3. Choice of optionaly pinged IP (allowing to wait with desktop connection till i.e. internal dns becomes reachable)
4. Choice/checkbox "dialup...
